To make this pizza, you will need to preheat the oven to 425°F. Then, roll out the pizza dough to a 12-inch circle and place it on a greased baking sheet. Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough and sprinkle with shredded cheese. Finally, bake for 15-20 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown.

To make a cheese pizza, start by rolling out pizza dough and pressing it into a greased pan. Then spread tomato sauce on the dough and sprinkle it with shredded mozzarella cheese. Finally, bake the pizza in an oven preheated to 450°F for 15-20 minutes.
